title: Antarctic TianMu Staring Observation Project I: Overview and Implementation of the Prototype Telescope
summary: Wide-field rapid sky surveys serve as critical observational methods for time-domain astronomical research. The Antarctic region, with several months of continuous dark nights annually, is an ideal site for time-domain astronomical observations.
